title: The Refectory Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, American, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Catering, Fusion, Southern American, Non-veg
description:
Serves meat, veg options available. Cafe offering vegan specials, and the menu labels what's vegetarian and vegan. Sample items include chili, kale salad, Indian dal, slaw, muffins, cookies, breakfast soy yogurt parfait and tofu scramble. Also has cold press juices, soy and coconut milk for coffee, and vegan desserts. Open and bright atmosphere. Order at counter for breakfast & lunch. Table
service, wine, beer and spirits for dinner.
